# Mahasiswa

Tahun 2019 Universitas Sultan Ageng Tirtayasa secara resmi menerima 4.134 mahasiswa baru jenjang S1 dan D3. Berikut adalah statistik mahasiswa baru Universitas Sultan Ageng Tirtayasa tahun akademik 2019/2020.

```{r, echo = FALSE, fig.cap="Mahasiswa Baru Berdasarkan Jalur Masuk dan Jenis Kelamin", out.width="150%"}
knitr::include_graphics(rep("static/02_JK.jpg"))
```

```{r, echo = FALSE, fig.cap="Mahasiswa Baru Berdasarkan Jalur Masuk di Setiap Fakultas", out.width="150%"}
knitr::include_graphics(rep("static/03_FAK.jpg"))
```

```{r, echo = FALSE, fig.cap="Mahasiswa Baru Berdasarkan Jalur Masuk di Setiap Program Studi", out.width="150%"}
knitr::include_graphics(rep("static/01_Fak Prodi.jpg"))
```

```{r, echo = FALSE, fig.cap="Mahasiswa Baru Berdasarkan Jalur Masuk dan Provinsi Asal Mahasiswa", out.width="150%"}
knitr::include_graphics(rep("static/04_PROV.jpg"))
```

```{r, echo = FALSE, fig.cap="Mahasiswa Baru Berdasarkan Jalur Masuk dan Penghasilan Orang Tua", out.width="150%"}
knitr::include_graphics(rep("static/05_Penghasilan Ortu.jpg"))
```

```{r, echo = FALSE, fig.cap="Mahasiswa Baru Berdasarkan Jalur Masuk dan Pendidikan Terakhir Orang Tua", out.width="150%"}
knitr::include_graphics(rep("static/06_PendTerahirOrtu.jpg"))
```

This is a _sample_ book written in **Markdown**. You can use anything that Pandoc's Markdown supports, e.g., a math equation $a^2 + b^2 = c^2$.

The **bookdown** package can be installed from CRAN or Github:

```{r eval=FALSE}
install.packages("bookdown")
# or the development version
# devtools::install_github("rstudio/bookdown")
```

Remember each Rmd file contains one and only one chapter, and a chapter is defined by the first-level heading `#`.

To compile this example to PDF, you need XeLaTeX. You are recommended to install TinyTeX (which includes XeLaTeX): <https://yihui.org/tinytex/>.

```{r include=FALSE}
# automatically create a bib database for R packages
knitr::write_bib(c(
  .packages(), 'bookdown', 'knitr', 'rmarkdown'
), 'packages.bib')
```
